title: Ticket #1526: MyProxy support for non-grid jobs
description: Currently, for grid universe jobs with an X509 proxy, the user can specify a MyProxy server that Condor can access to update the job's proxy. Igor Sfiligoi would like this ability for vanilla universe jobs.
remarks:

Bulk change of target version from v070505 to v070506 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2011-Feb-01 16:08:44 by tannenba:
Bulk change of target version from v070506 to NULL using ./ticket-target-mover.
creator: jfrey
